pr_title: Return fake zero to avoid tripping nullability checks

timeline.message: return fake zero to avoid tripping nullability checks

timeline.bodyText: What were the errors that we are fixing?
timeline.author: dmitry-s

replies.bodyText:
[ERROR] testParallelOperations  Time elapsed: 0.243 s  <<< ERROR!
org.springframework.dao.EmptyResultDataAccessException: Result must not be null!
	at org.springframework.cloud.gcp.data.spanner.repository.it.ParallelSpannerRepositoryIntegrationTests.testParallelOperations(ParallelSpannerRepositoryIntegrationTests.java:59)

The test entity is shared among several tests, so the @NotNull did its job too well.
replies.author: elefeint
